name: Lucky Guy (Davi Fox)
description:
A platformer where you have control of the environment, but not the main 
character!

"I'm a luck man, a luck guy... so lucky that I could like... blindfold myself 
and like... get out on the street and...  nothing bad would ever happen to me, 
'cause I'm so lucky u know, like SO LUCKY."

CONTROLS: 

Left Click/Touch (on android devices) to move objects.

TOOLS USED:

Engine: Godot 3.0.5
Music: BoscaCeoil
Pixel Art: Aseprite

CREDITS:

Font: Pixeled by OmegaPC777
"Lucky!" audio: Taken from the movie "Napoleon Dynamite"
